long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of Reddit forcing WEBP files on you, that many programs can't read, and yearn for the good ol' days of JPEGs that work with everything?  Then this extension is for you!  If there is an underlying JPG or PNG this extension will retrieve it instead.
